name: ListMerchants
description:
Retrieve a list of merchants with pagination support.

Use this tool to access a list of merchants, with the ability to paginate through results. Ideal for exploring available merchants or integrating merchant data into applications.

parameters.name: filter_from_date
parameters.description: Filter merchants by transactions on or after this date (`user_transaction_time`). Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: Filter merchants by transactions occurring (`user_transaction_time`) on or after this date

parameters.name: filter_by_transaction_to_date
parameters.description: Filter merchants by transactions occurring on or before this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

value_schema.description: Filter merchants by transactions occurring (`user_transaction_time`) on or before this date

parameters.name: pagination_start_id
parameters.description: The ID of the last entity from the previous page for pagination.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of merchants to return per page, between 2 and 100. Default is 20 if unspecified.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

parameters.name: transaction_from_date
parameters.description: Filter merchants by transactions occurring (`user_transaction_time`) on or after this date

value_schema.description: Filter merchants by transactions occurring (`user_transaction_time`) on or after this date

parameters.name: transaction_to_date
parameters.description: Filter merchants by transactions occurring (`user_transaction_time`) on or before this date

value_schema.description: Filter merchants by transactions occurring (`user_transaction_time`) on or before this date

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
